resources.string: step 1: Lie on your belly with your hands alongside your torso, palms up. Step 2: Exhale and bend your knees, bringing your heels as close as you can to your buttocks. Step 3: Strongly lift your heels away from your buttocks and lift your thighs away from the floor. Step 4: Press your shoulder blades firmly against your back to open your heart. Draw the tops of the shoulders away from your ears. Sure, not to stop breathing.
